boat.name: The John and Elsie
boat.full_description: The Tela Class was developed by Chris Libby of Penryn and subsequently by Greg Dalrymple of Salterns Boatyard. The John and Elsie is a 2018 OGA winner currently undergoing re-varnishing and polishing
boat.construction_details: Mould taken from a 1911 Bristol Channel work boat.
boat.short_description: The John and Elsie' is a Tela, 16' 6" gaff-rigged dayboat. The class was built from a mould taken from a 3/4 decked work boat built in 1911, a Seeker Boat working out of Barry Docks.

for_sales.sales_text:
This popular dayboat, a "Tela" 16"6' gaffer with topsail, was built in 2007 by Salterns, Burlesden. She is based on the  "seeking boats" of the Bristol Channel. "The John and Elsie" has been well maintained and improved as shown by the comprehensive inventory.

Inventory

Road trailer with lightboard and winter all over cover
Stowage in covered boxes under side benches
Quarter Boxes under side decks (for phones VHF sandwiches etc)
Compass

List of works completed (plus usual annual maintenance)

2014

Alter cockpit cover accommodate boom end
Storage boxes with covers and retaining rails under side benches
Topping Lift- turning block on and on boom with cleat
Flag halyard
Rowlock lanyards
Pin rail for halyards with brass pins
Honda 2.3 outboard serviced annually 
Topsail stowage bag
Anchor stowage chocks
Winter cover
Outboard engine cover
2 x reefing system with turning blocks and cleats lead inboard on boom 
Rudder safety lanyard

2015

Copper boat anti foul (By Salterns Oxford)
Inspection eye to check centreboard and removable top to centre board case
Renew centreboard wire
New main and jib - Sail Shape Cornwall
Locker tool box
Cruising chute and equipment (ex racing dinghy)

2016

Set up small jib halyard and fairleads

Various running rigging replacements as necessary

Adjustable mainsail outhaul and downhaul, 2017
Longer boom to increase sail adjustment, 2018
Quarter box under side decks for stowage, 2018
Standing Rigging including bob stay and bottle screws , 2017
Cleats under foredeck to stop jib stick boat etc rolling about, 2016
